2023.title: Numerical Methods for Differential Equations
2023.organizers: Dr. Rajesh Kumar & Dr. Sunita Sharma
2023.description: This session focuses on advanced numerical techniques for solving partial differential equations with applications in computational fluid dynamics and climate modeling.

2023.title: Machine Learning for Mathematical Optimization
2023.organizers: Dr. Neha Patil & Dr. Rajiv Mishra
2023.description: Exploring the intersection of machine learning algorithms and mathematical optimization techniques with applications in data science and operations research.
speakers: Prof. Lisa Zhang, University of Toronto

2023.title: Algebraic Coding Theory and Cryptography
2023.organizers: Prof. Ravi Shankar & Dr. Meena Agarwal
2023.description: This session covers recent advances in algebraic coding theory and its applications in modern cryptographic systems, including post-quantum cryptography.

2023.title: Financial Mathematics and Risk Analysis
2023.organizers: Dr. Vikram Nair & Dr. Priya Deshmukh
2023.description: Exploring mathematical models for financial markets, risk assessment, and portfolio optimization in the context of modern economic challenges.
speakers: Prof. Ramesh Jha, Indian School of Business
Dr. Sarah Chen, London School of Economics

2024.title: Quantum Computing and Algorithms
2024.organizers: Dr. Lakshmi Narayan & Dr. Alex Wong
2024.description: Exploring quantum algorithms and their applications in solving complex mathematical problems that are intractable with classical computers.
speakers: Prof. Jane Chen, University of California

2024.title: Topological Data Analysis
2024.organizers: Prof. Ananya Roy & Dr. William Johnson
2024.description: Applications of algebraic topology to extract insights from complex high-dimensional data sets across various domains.
speakers: Prof. Robert Patel, University of Michigan

2025.title: Mathematical Biology and Epidemiology
2025.organizers: Prof. Nikhil Mehta & Dr. Sarah Thompson
2025.description: Mathematical modeling of biological systems and disease spread, with focus on predictive models for epidemic control.
speakers: Dr. Meera Joshi, WHO Research Division
Dr. Anita Desai, National Institute of Epidemiology

2025.title: AI and Mathematical Reasoning
2025.organizers: Dr. Vikram Singh & Prof. Lisa Wong
2025.description: Exploring the intersection of artificial intelligence and mathematical reasoning, including automated theorem proving and AI-assisted mathematics.
